songs.title: Draco
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh, yeah, yeah, yeahhh, yeah
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Aye, yeah, aye

[Chorus]
We can link and meet
I'm like pussy where you at
These niggas tryna run and hide, I think you double back
This ain't no meet and greet, but say "hello to my lil friend"
My glizzy hold them .35, with one off in the head
He tryna make a scene, all that attention shit be dead
I caught him on the [?], I make the pussy dirty dance
You know I got a beam, this bitch suwoop, bloody red
I heard he got some pressure we gon' shoot up where he stay at

[Verse]
Hold up, I just cocked the tool with the dick
Who done told something, my nigga made the news with that stick
Pending murder charges but them bitches ain't gon' stick (ain't none)
They ain't got no peanut butter, where the fuckin' evidence? (uh, huh)
They say a legend in the making, no fakin' it's evident (okay)
But I got patience so I'm waiting, ain't takin' yo' offering (okay)
They say it took a nigga years to do this shit, I just begin (uh, huh)
I done caught a flight with Delta Airlines, I'm in the wind (I'm gone)
They say I blowed up, blowed up, like a balloon (uh, huh)
You better follow rules, I teach a nigga [?] like he in school (oh, yeah)
They say I blowed up, blowed up, like a balloon
You better follow rules, I teach a nigga [?] like he in school (aye, aye)

[Chorus]
We can link and meet
I'm like pussy where you at
These niggas tryna run and hide, I think you double back
This ain't no meet and greet, but say "hello to my lil friend"
My glizzy hold them .35, with one off in the head
He tryna make a scene, all that attention shit be dead
I caught him on the [?], I make the pussy dirty dance
You know I got a beam, this bitch suwoop, bloody red
I heard he got some pressure we gon' shoot up where he stay at
